name: America Dait?ry? Senkyo
description: In this game, you become a candidate for becoming a new United States president. You choose a candidate out of several available ones (both Republican and Democrats), and then raise your popularity in various states, competing with other candidates. You must excel in every area of politics, from foreign diplomacy to passing laws in a state. After each stage, you are shown statistics where your success is compared to that of other presidents. You can also check at any stage the reaction of the people to your deeds, making surveys and seeing how well you are doing.

shot.caption: One of the candidates, a Republican
Three Republican and three Democrate candidates - you'll be one of them
Hey, I didn't know I was a WASP!
The first mission is in Michigan
Thanks, babe, your help is much appreciated! Now how about a massage?!..
Lots of stuff to think about, when you want to become a president...
By moving this elephant to the right or to the left, you express your tendency towards two opposite kinds of politics
Hmm, you aren't doing very well!
Final results for the first stage. You lost totally
